channel.title: Git on Shane
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Shane

item.title: Error:Password Authentication
item.description: Error:git push Link to heading Description: Link to heading remote: Support for password authentication was removed on August 13, 2021. Solution: Link to heading Use token other than password to log in. Go to github->settings->Developer Settings->personal access tokens generate new tokens, save it. When you push new commit, enter the token other than your password
